sense.gloss: to see, to look, to watch, to view, to observe
to examine, to look over, to assess, to check, to judge
to look after, to attend to, to take care of, to keep an eye on
to experience, to meet with (misfortune, success, etc.)
to try ..., to have a go at ..., to give ... a try
to see (that) ..., to find (that) ...
to be seen, to be visible, to be in sight
to look, to seem, to appear
to come
point of view, viewpoint, angle, perspective
visual point (position of the eye in calculations of optical instruments)
disregarding, ignoring
monitoring, watching, observation, surveillance, guarding, supervision, lookout
regarding as important, attaching importance to, taking a serious view of, putting emphasis on
looking and listening, (television) viewing, watching
(public) attention, interest
one's line of sight, one's gaze, one's eyes (looking), glance, gaze, look
sense of sight, vision
field of vision, view
one's outlook (e.g. on life), one's horizons

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑赤信号↑↓あかしんごう↓を↑無視↑↓むし↓して↑走↑↓はし↓りましたね。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑健康↑↓けんこう↓を↑度外視↑↓どがいし↓するわけにはいかない。
sdata.e: You can't afford to neglect your health.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑直視↑↓ちょくし↓しなければならない。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑直視↑↓ちょくし↓しなくてはならない。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑直視↑↓ちょくし↓しなくてはいけない。
↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑出来事↑↓できごと↓を↑重視↑↓じゅうし↓しすぎる。
sdata.e: You make too much of the event.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑重視↑↓じゅうし↓すべきだ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓はこの↑結果↑↓けっか↓を↑軽視↑↓けいし↓すべきじゃない。
sdata.e: You should not think little of this result.

sdata.j: ↑金銭↑↓きんせん↓を↑重視↑↓じゅうし↓しすぎてはいけない。
sdata.e: We should not place too much emphasis on money.

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓きん↓を↑幸福↑↓こうふく↓と↑同一↑↓どういつ↓↑視↑↓し↓するなんてばかげたことだ。
sdata.e: It is foolish to equate money with happiness.
